overview: This ain't Doctor Who! In the year 2120 a clairvoyant scientist, gleefully played by Teri Weigel, teams up with Rich Handsome to discover the secrets of time travel. Our heroine has an insatiable curiosity about the history of sex, and by caressing historical artifacts, she is transported through time and space, throughout the eons, to experience the carnal pleasures of eras long gone.
title: Time Traveler
